document_data.name: Scupperden
document_data.owner: Davon Graesus[[Matt Goetz]]"Backdrop:  Skullport" ''[[Dungeon magazine|Dungeon]] '' #200. Renton, WA: Wizards of the Coast, March, 2012.
document_data.mainbody: '''Scupperden''' was an eatery located in the Dredge, the lowest level of [[Skullport]]. The establishment was known primarily for its [[stew]] made of [[fish]], [[mushroom]]s and [[vegetable]] scraps which sold for 1 [[cp]] per [[bowl]]. The stew was described as somewhat alarming but unlikely to kill the eater.
document_data.Description: Scupperden was a single room built from scavenged wood, [[sailcloth]] and [[rope]]. Inside, patrons lined up to a twenty foot long serving trough.
